A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
zero stars This thing had so many plot holes it was like looking through swiss cheese.
Rian Johnson took a huge dump on a 40 year epic story.
Complete failure with the treatment of Luke Skywalker... if you were going to kill him ...he should have gone out Wolverine/Akira style \, laying waste to EVERYTHING in Person\, not the little wuss way he supposedly did (maybe JJ Abrams can figure out how to resurrect him.
Leaia flying\, milking a creature fishing with a long stick \, THROWING HIS LIGHTSABER IN THE OCEAN... leaving a map for none to find him ... Casino scene ...Social justice warrior crap run amok.
Horrible\, disgraceful treatment of the most epic story ever told ...just a disgraceful disregard for the potential The Force Awakens had set up.... Disgraceful dumpster fire of a waste of digital storage media.
